Text: please help seed this for the first few days until it gets started.  i'll be dropping this to low priority once i upload 5gb. so many people just downloading and not sharing

Thanks so much, my kids are a great fans of Peppa Pig. Peppa pig is not sold in our country. By the way, do you have subtitles for all series and episodes? It will be perfect if you have them.
Thanks again.

I see. In fact, I can understand 90% of the words. But just miss out some lines. 
Like for Peppa Christmas, when Santa climbed down from the chimney, he said something like "why are these chimneys always so ?"? Just can't understand the last word. So sometimes hard to explain to the kids. You have any idea what's the last word? Thanks
Munce888: the word is SUTTY, meaning dusty.
sorry for being pedantic,  but it's "sooty" meaning "covered in soot" (but pronounced like sutty).
I hope you will upload the rest of S04 as well, and there is one happy toodler at home hoping the same :)
Thank you, the kids love Peppa pig
